title: Wani – embodiment of Kashmir independence from India: Fawad
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 8 (APP): Federal Minister for Information and Broadcasting Chaudhry Fawad Hussain on Thursday said Burhan Wani Shaheed was the embodiment of the Kashmiris’ long cherished independence of the Jammu and Kashmir from Indian subjugation.
Paying tributes to Burhan Muzaffar Wani on his martyrdom anniversary, the minister said in a tweet that he (Wani) in fact had become an icon of Kashmiris’ freedom movement. His martyrdom was a true depiction of the Kashmiris’ liberation struggle from Indian yoke.
برہان وانی شہید مقبوضہ کشمیرکی آزادی اور بھارت کی غلامی سے نجات کا برملااعلان ہے۔ برہانی وانی دراصل اہل جموں وکشمیر کی آزادی کی تڑپ کی علامت ہے۔ایک مظفروانی شہید کی آواز کامقابلہ نہ کرسکنے والابھارت لاکھوں کشمیریوں کے جذبے کوکیسے شکست دے گا؟شہادت کے دن پرکشمیر کے اس ہیرو کو سلام۔
— Ch Fawad Hussain (@fawadchaudhry) July 8, 2021
How India, which could not suppress the voice of Burhan Wani, could dampen the spirit of millions of Kashmiris for independence, he added.
